alert.note: Alert for Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 1:59AM MST until January 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero later this afternoon and tonight. * WHERE...Union County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
